original_title: Mío será otro cuerpo. En busca de C. E. Feiling
overview: Like a pair of wild detectives, two friends sniff around the library of eccentric writer and critic C.E. Feiling in search of the traces of a cult author, a punk dandy who swam against the current of Argentine literature.
title: Mine Will Be Another Flesh. In Search of C.E. Feiling
